Translations.Text: M. S
This scripture hav revealed vi - Vi ne haven dub gxi en your kor - Ke vi avert gxi proviz reminder believers
Vi shall all sekv ki revealed vi your Lord ne sekv any idols Him! Rarely do vi pren heed
Many community ni annihilated ili incurred our retribution while ili est asleep largx awake
Their utterance when our retribution ven them est Ja ni est transgressors
Ni certainly question those ricev message ni question messengers
Ni inform them authoritatively ni est neniam absent
Skal est atenc ke tag equitably. Those weights est heavy est winners
As por those weights est light ili est unu perd their anim consequence de disregarding our revelations unjustly
Ni establ vi ter ni hav proviz por vi means support therein! Rarely est vi appreciative
Ni kre vi tiam ni shaped vi tiam ni dir al angxel, Fal prostrate Adam. Ili fal prostrate escept Iblees (Satan;) li ne est prostrators
Li dir Ki prevent vi el prostrating when mi ord vi? Li dir mi est put than li; Vi kre me el fajr kre him el kot
Li dir Do vi ir down vi ne est est arrogant here. Get vi debased
Li dir Grant me respite Tag Resurrection
Li dir Vi granted respite
Li dir Ekde Vi hav willed ke mi ir astray mi skulk them Your rekt path
Mi ven them el them behind them el their dekstr el their las Vi trov ke plej de them est unappreciative
Li dir Get therefrom despised defeated Those among them sekv vi mi fill Infer vi all
As por vi Adam logx your wife en Paradise mangx therefrom vi placx ne approach this 1 arb lest vi fal en pek
Diabl flustr them en ord reveal their korp est invisible al them. Li dir Your Lord ne forbid vi this arb prevent vi el igx angxel ating etern existence
Li jxur them mi don vi bon advice
LI TIEL duped them mensog As baldaux as ili gust arb their korp igx visible al them ili pen kovr foli Paradise! Their Lord vok them mi ne enjoin vi Did el ke arb avert vi diabl est your ardent enemy
Ili dir Our Lord ni wronged our anim kaj Vi forgive us hav mercy us ni est losers
Li dir Ir down enemies de 1 another Sur ter est your habitation provision por awhile
Li dir gxi vi viv gxi vi mort el gxi vi est brought out
O infan Adam ni proviz vi garments kovr your korp tro luks! Put garment est garment righteousness. These est kelk da di sign ti ili pren heed

O infan Adam ne let diabl dupe vi as li did when li kauxz eviction your parents Paradise removal their garments expose their korp. Li his gent vid vi, while vi ne seg them. Ni appoint diabl companions de those ne kred
Ili commit gross pek tiam dir Ni trov ni parents doing this DI komand us do gxi. Dir DI neniam advokat pek! Vi dir DI ki vi ne kon
Dir My Lord advokat justice star devoted al Him sol cxiu met worship Vi devote your worship absolutely Him sol. Just as Li iniciat vi vi ultimately ir Him
Kelk Li direkt while others committed straying Ili pren diabl their mastr DI ili kred ke ili direkt
O infan Adam vi est clean vest nicely when vi ir masjid! Mangx trink moderately; Surely Li ne am gluttons

Dir Who prohibited nice ajx DI kre His creatures bon provisions Dir Such provisions est gxu en this life those kred! Ankaux bon provisions est exclusively theirs Tag Resurrection. Ni tiel eksplik revelations popol who kon
Dir My Lord prohibits nur evil deeds est ili obvious fel pek unjustifiable aggression set DI powerless idols al dir DI ki vi ne kon
each community tie predetermined life sxpin. Once their interim ven end ili ne delay gxi 1 hor nor advance gxi
O infan Adam when messengers ven vi vi recite My revelations al vi those sorb heed plumb righteous life hav nothing tim nor vol ili grieve
As por those reject our revelations est tro arrogant uphold them ili incurred Infer wherein ili abide forever

Who evil than those est invent mensog DI reject His revelations? These get their akci en accordance kun scripture tiam when our messengers ven terminate their viv ili dir Kie est idols vi uz implore DI? Ili dir Ili abandoned us. Ili bor witness themselves ili est disbelievers

Li dir Enter previous communities de jinns humans into Infer. Cxiu temp grup enters ili curse their ancestral grup! Once ili est all gxi latest unu dir de previous unu Our Lord these est des unu misled us! Don them double retribution Infer. Li dir Each ricev double vi ne kon
ancestral grup vol dir al later grup Ekde vi hav avantagx us gust retribution your own pek
Surely those reject our revelations est tro arrogant uphold them gates cxiel neniam open them nor vol ili enter Paradise kamel pas needle's okul! Ni tiel requite kulp
Ili incurred Infer abode; ili hav barriers them. Ni tiel requite transgressors
As por those kred plumb righteous life! - Ni neniam sxargx any anim its means - these est dwellers Paradise. Ili abide gxi forever

Ni remove all jealousy their kor. River flu them ili dir DI lauxd por direkt us! Ni possibly ne direkt ne est DI direkt us. messengers our Lord did bring truth. Ili est vok This est your Paradise! Vi hered gxi dors your works
dwellers Paradise vok dwellers Infer Ni trov our Lord's promes est truth hav vi trov your Lord's promes est truth Ili dir Jes announcer them anonc di condemnation befallen transgressors
who repel path DI strive far gxi crooked regard Hereafter ili est disbelievers
barrier separates them while Purgatory okup popol recognize each flank their jen. Ili vok dwellers de Paradise Pac est upon vi Ili ne enter (Paradise wishful opini)
When ili torn their okul dwellers Infer ili dir Our Lord do ne put us these wicked popol
dwellers Purgatory vol vok sur popol ili recognize their jen dir Your great numer ne avail vi en any voj nor did your arrogance
Est those popol vi jxur DI testament neniam tusx them kun mercy?" (popol Purgatory vol tiam told Enter Paradise; vi hav nothing tim nor vol vi grieve)
dwellers Infer vok sur dwellers Paradise Let kelk da your akv kelk da di provisions al vi flu us Ili dir DI forbidden them disbelievers
Those ne sorb their religi seriously totally preoccupied this worldly life ni forges them ke tag ili forges ke tag kaj ili spurned our revelations
Ni don them scripture fully detal knowledge guidance mercy popol kred

Ili waiting all (prophecies) est fulfilled Tag such fulfillment ven pas those disregarded gxi en des preter dir messengers our Lord brought truth. Tie any intercessors est al intercede our behalf? Would vi send us tial ke ni sxangx our behavior bon works than ki ni did Ili perd their anim their own innovations kauxz their doom

Your Lord est 1 DI kre heavens ter 6 tag tiam assumed all auxtoritat. Nokt overtakes tag gxi pursues gxi persistently sun lun stel committed dejxor His ordon! Absolutely Li controls all creation all ordon. Exalted est DI Lord univers
Vi worship your Lord publicly privately; Li ne am transgressors
Ne corrupt ter gxi set rekt worship Him reverence esper! Surely di mercy est attainable per des righteous
Li est 1 who send vent bon omen mercy el His man! Once ili gather heavy nub ni sxofor them dead land send down akv therefrom produkt gxi all kinds da frukt! Ni tiel resurrect dead ke vi pren heed
Bon land readily produkt its plant las its Lord while mav land barely produkt anything util. Ni tiel eksplik revelations popol est appreciative
Ni send Noah his popol dir O my popol worship DI; vi ne hav ali di Him. Mi tim por vi retribution awesome tag
Estr his popol dir Ni seg vi est far astray
Li dir O my popol mi est astray; mi est messenger Lord univers
Mi liver vi messages my Lord mi advise vi mi kon DI ki vi ne kon
Est gxi tro mult de wonder ke reminder ven vi your Lord hom vi avert vi plumb vi al righteousness ke vi ating mercy
Ili rejected him. Consequently ni sav him those him en ark ni dron those rejected our revelations; ili est blind
Al ‘Aad ni send their frat Hood Li dir O my popol worship DI; vi ne hav ali di Him. Vi tiam observ righteousness
Estr disbelieved his popol dir Ni seg vi behaving foolishly ni opini vi est liar
Li dir O my popol tie ne est foolishness me mi est messenger Lord univers
Mi liver vi my Lord's messages mi honestly advising vi
Est gxi tro mult de wonder ke message ven vi your Lord hom vi avert vi? Recall ti Li far vi inheritors popol Noah multiplied your numer! Memor di blessings ke vi sukces
Ili dir vi ven far us worship DI sol abandon ki our parents uz worship Ni challenge vi bring doom vi minac us vi est truthful
Li dir Vi incurred condemnation wrath your Lord Do vi argue me innovations vi fabricated - Vi your parents - which neniam authorized DI? Do wait mi wait vi
Ni tiam sav him those him per mercy el us ni annihilated those rejected our revelations rifuz est believers

Al Thamoud ni send their frat Saaleh. Li dir O my popol worship DI; vi ne hav ali di Him. Proof est proviz por vi el your Lord here est di kamel dejxor sign vi! Let her mangx di land do ne tusx her any harm lest vi incur painful retribution
Recall ti Li far vi inheritors ‘Aad establ vi ter mason mansions its val carving hejm its mont! Vi memor di blessings ne roam ter corruptingly
arrogant estr his popol dir al komun popol kred Kiel do vi kon ti Saaleh send his Lord Ili dir message li brought far us believers
arrogant unu dir Ni disbelieve en ki vi kred en
Subsequently ili bucx kamel ribel their Lord's ordon dir O Saaleh bring doom vi minac us vi est really messenger
Consequently quake annihilated them las them dead their hejm
Li torn them dir O my popol mi liver my Lord's message vi advised vi vi ne like any advisers
Lot dir al his popol Vi commit such abomen; ne 1 en des mond done gxi antaux
Vi practice seks hom women Ja vi est transgressing popol
His popol respond per dir Evict them your town! Ili est popol who wish est pur
Consequently ni sav him his famili ne his wife; sxi est kun des doomed
Ni dusx them nepr dusx; not consequences kulp

Al Midyan ni send their frat Shu aib. Li dir O my popol worship DI; vi ne hav ali di Him. Proof ven vi your Lord Vi don plen weight plen mezur when vi meti. Ne cheat popol their dekstr! Ne corrupt ter gxi set rekt! This est put vi se vi est believers
Refrain blok cxiu path streb repel those kred path DI ne far gxi crooked Memor vi uz est few Li multiplied your numer! Recall consequences por des wicked
Tuj kelk da vi hav kred en ki mi send kelk disbelieved wait DI issues His judgment us; Li est bon jugx
arrogant estr his popol dir Ni evict vi O Shu aib together those who kred vi our town vi revert our religi. Li dir vi force us

Ni blaspheming DI ni reverted your religi DI sav us el gxi! Kiel ni revert dors al gxi vol DI our Lord Our Lord's knowledge encompasses all ajx. Ni put our fid DI! Our Lord grant us decisive victory our popol! Vi est bon supporter
disbelieving estr his popol dir vi sekv Shu aib vi est losers
quake annihilated them las them dead their hejm
Those rejected Shu aib vanished as ili neniam ekzist. Those rejected Shu aib est losers
Li torn them dir O my popol mi liver vi messages my Lord mi advised vi! Kiel can mi grieve disbelieving popol
Whenever ni send prophet any community ni aflikt its popol adversity hardship ili implore
Tiam ni substituted pac prosperity en met de ke hardship. Sed alas ili torn heedless dir est our parents spert hardship prosperity. Consequently ni pun them suddenly when ili malplej expected
Hav popol those communities kred torn righteous ni dusx them blessings heaven ter! Ekde ili decid disbelieve ni pun them ki ili earned
Popol prezent communities garanti ke our retribution ne ven them nokt as ili dorm
Popol hodiaux communities garanti ke our retribution ne ven them daytime while ili lud
Ili pren di plan por granted Neniom pren di plan por granted losers
Gxi Does ever occur those hered ter previous generaci ke ni ni pun them their pek sigel their kor kauxz them turn surd
Ni narrate vi histori those communities their messengers ir them klar proofs ili ne est kred en ki ili rejected antaux! DI TIEL SIGEL KOR disbelievers
Ni trov ke plej de them disregard their covenant ni trov plej de them wicked
Post (those messengers) ni send Moses our sign Pharaoh his popol ili transgressed Not consequences por des wicked
Moses dir O Pharaoh mi est messenger el Lord univers
est incumbent upon me mi ne dir DI escept truth! Mi ven vi sign el your Lord let Infan Israel ir
Li dir vi hav sign tiam produkt gxi vi est truthful
Li jxet down his stab gxi torn into tremendous serpent
Li sorb his man gxi est blank al beholders
Estr Pharaoh's popol dir This est ne plur than clever magician
Li wants pren vi your land; ki do vi rekomend
Ili dir Respite him his frat send summoners cxiu urb
Let them summon cxiu spert magician
magicians ven Pharaoh dir ni pag ni Do est winners
Li dir Jes ja; vi ecx igx me
Ili dir O Moses either vi jxet ni jxet
Li dir Vi jxet. When ili jxet ili tricked popol okul intimidated them produkt great magic
Ni tiam inspir Moses Jxet down your stab whereupon gxi hirund whatever ili fabricated
Tiel truth prevailed ki ili did nullified
Ili defeated tiam tie; ili humiliated
magicians fal prostrate
Ili dir Ni kred en Lord univers
Lord de Moses Aaron
Pharaoh dir Did vi kred en him my permission? This est conspiracy vi schemed urb en ord sorb its popol! Vi do gxi surely trov out
Mi fason your man fut sur altern flank tiam mi crucify vi all
Ili dir Ni tiam return our Lord
Vi persekut us simply ni kred en proofs our Lord when ili ven us. Our Lord grant us steadfastness mort submitters
Estr Pharaoh's popol dir Vol vi allow Moses his popol corrupt ter forsake vi your di? Li dir Ni kill their fil sxpar their daughters! Ni est mult powerful than ili est
Moses dir al his popol Streb di help steadfastly persevere Ter aparten al DI Li grants gxi whomever Li chooses His servants. ultimate victory aparten al des righteous
Ili dir Ni persekut antaux vi ven us kaj vi ven us. Li dir Your Lord annihilate your enemy establ vi ter tiam Li seg kiel vi behave
Ni tiam aflikt Pharaoh's popol drought shortage de crops ti ili pren heed
When bon omens ven their voj ili dir Ni ind this when hardship aflikt them ili blamed Moses those him. En fakt, their omens decid nur DI plej de them ne kon
Ili dir Ne materi ki kind da sign vi montr us dupe us your magic ni ne kred
Consequently ni send them inund locusts lice ran sang - profound sign. Ili argument their arrogance. Ili est evil popol
Whenever pest aflikt them ili dir O Moses implore your Lord - Vi est Him. Vi relieve this pest ni kred vi send Infan Israel vi
sed when ni relieved pest any length temp ili violated their pledge
Consequently ni vengx their actions dron them mar. Ke because ili rejected our sign est totally heedless thereof
Ni let oppressed popol hered land orient okcident ni ben gxi! ben ordon your Lord tiel fulfilled Infan Israel rekompenc them their steadfastness ni annihilated works Pharaoh his popol cxio ili rikolt
Ni liver Infan Israel mar. When ili pas popol worshipping statu ili dir O Moses far di us like di ili hav. Li dir Ja vi est ignorant popol
These popol committing blasphemy ki ili doing est disastrous por them
Mi streb vi DI your di when Li est ben vi plur than anyone aux en des mond
Recall ti ni liver vi Pharaoh's popol inflicted mav persecution vi killing your fil sxpar your daughters! Ke exacting trial vi your Lord
Ni summoned Moses 30 nokt komplet them per adding 10! Tiel audience his Lord last 40 nokt. Moses dir al his frat Aaron Rest here my popol argument righteousness ne sekv voj corruptors

When Moses ven our appointed temp his Lord parol kun him li dir My Lord let me jen vid Vi, Li dir Vi ne seg Me Jen je ke mont se gxi rest its ej tiam vi seg Me Tiam his Lord manifested mont this kauxz gxi cxif! Moses fal unconscious When li ven li dir Vi glor. Mi pent Vi mi plej konvink believer
Li dir O Moses mi chosen vi all popol My messages per parol al vi! Do pren ki mi don vi est appreciative
Ni skrib por him tablets all kinds da enlightenments detal de cxio Vi uphold these teachings strongly exhort your popol uphold them! - these est bon teachings. Mi pint por vi sort de des wicked

Mi divert My revelations those est arrogant ter justification. Consequently when ili seg cxiu kind da proof ili ne kred. Kaj when ili seg path guidance ili ne adopt gxi as their path when ili seg path straying ili adopt gxi their path. This est consequence de their rejecting our proofs est totally heedless thereof
Those reject our revelations meeting Hereafter their works nullified Ili requited nur ki ili committed
Dum his absence Moses' popol far el their jewelry statu calf komplet son calf Ili ne seg gxi ne parol al them direkt them any path? Ili worshipped gxi do torn wicked
Finally when ili bedauxr their action realized ti ili ir astray ili dir our Lord redeems us His mercy forgives us ni est losers

When Moses returned his popol koler disappointed li dir Ki terrible ajx vi hav done en my absence! Could vi ne wait commandments your Lord Li jxet down tablets sorb ten his frat kap tir him towards himself! (Aaron) dir Fil my mother popol sorb avantagx da my weakness preskaux killed me Let ne my enemies gxoj do ne count me transgressing popol
Moses dir My Lord forgive me my frat admit us into Your mercy! De all merciful unu Vi est plej Merciful
Surely those idolized calf incurred wrath their Lord humiliation en this life. Ni tiel requite innovators
As por those who committed pek tiam pent thereafter kred your Lord - Post this - est Forgiver Merciful
When Moses' anger subsided li pik tablets containing guidance mercy those reverence their Lord

Moses tiam selected 70 hom el his popol ven our appointed audience. When quake sxancel them li dir My Lord Vi annihilated them en des preter, together me se Vi tial willed! Vi annihilate us deeds de those among us est foolish? This est test Vi institut us. Kun gxi Vi kondamn whomever Vi testament direkt whomever Vi testament Vi est our Lord Mastr tial forgive us dusx us Your mercy; Vi est bon Forgiver

Kaj dekret por us righteousness en this mond en Hereafter Ni pent Vi. Li dir My retribution befalls whomever mi testament. My mercy encompasses all ajx. Tamen mi specify gxi those who (1) plumb righteous life (2) don obligatory charity (Zakat) (3) kred en our revelations kaj

sekv messenger gentile prophet (Muhammad) ili trov skrib their Torah Gospel. Li exhorts them est righteous enjoins them el evil allows por them all bon food prohibits ke est mav unloads sxargx shackles trud upon them! Those kred en him respekt him support him sekv light ven kun him est successful unu

Dir O popol mi est di messenger all da vi! Al Him aparten sovereignty de heavens ter! tie ne est di escept Li! Li controls life death. Do vi kred en DI His messenger gentile prophet kred en DI His vort. Sekv him vi direkt
Among followers Moses tie est those direkt en accordance kun truth truth renders them righteous

Ni divid them 12 tribal communities ni inspir Moses when his popol pet him akv Strik rok your stab whereupon 12 risort sxpruc out therefrom Tiel each community kon its akv. Kaj ni shaded them nub send down al them manna quails Mangx bon ajx ni proviz por vi ne est us ili wronged est ili wronged their own anim
Recall ili told Ir this town viv mangx therefrom vi placx trakt popol amicably enter gate humbly Ni tiam forgive your transgressions. Ni multiply rekompenc por des righteous
evil unu them substituted ali ordon ordon don them. Consequently ni send them condemnation cxiel their wickedness
Remind them de community mar desecrated Sabbath! When ili observ Sabbath fisx ven them abundantly. Kaj when ili violated Sabbath fisx ne ven. Ni tiel aflikt them consequence their transgression
Recall grup de them dir should vi predik popol whom DI testament surely annihilate pun severely Ili respond "Apologize al your Lord ili sav
When ili disregarded ki ili reminded de ni sav those prohibited evil aflikt wrongdoers terrible retribution their wickedness
When ili ad defy commandments ni dir al them Est vi despicable apes
Additionally your Lord dekret Li raise them popol inflict severe persecution them gxis Tag Resurrection. Your Lord est efficient en enforcing retribution Li est certainly Forgiver Merciful
Ni scattered them many communities land. Kelk da them est righteous kelk est malpli than righteous. Ni tested them prosperity hardship ke ili return

Subsequent al them Li substituted neo generaci hered scripture. Sed ili opted worldly life instead dir Ni forgiven. tiam ili ad opt sxtof this mond. Ili ne far covenant uphold scripture Did ne al dir DI truth? Ili ne stud scripture? Certainly abode Hereafter est far put those argument righteousness. Vi ne kompren
Those uphold scripture observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) ni neniam fail recompense des pi
Ni raised mont them like ombrel ili opini gxi fal them Vi uphold ki ni don vi strongly memor kontent thereof ke vi sav
Recall ke your Lord summoned all descendants Adam hav them bor witness themselves Est mi ne your Lord Ili all dir Jes Ni bor witness Do vi ne dir Tag Resurrection Ni ne est aware da this
Nor can vi dir est our parents practiced idolatry ni simply sekv en their footsteps. Vi pun us ki others innovated
Ni tiel eksplik revelations enable popol redeem
Recite them news de 1 who don our proofs chose disregard them! Consequently diabl pursued him gxis li igx strayer

Hav ni willed ni elevated him therewith li insist baston muel pursued his own opinions! Tiel li est hund; vi pet him scold him li pantalon! Such est ekzempl popol reject our proofs Narrate these narrations ke ili reflect
mav ja est ekzempl popol reject our proofs est nur their own anim ili wrong
Whomever DI direkt des ver direkt unu whomever Li commits straying these est losers
Ni committed al Infer multitudes de jinns humans. Ili hav mens ili do ne kompren okul ili ne seg orel ili ne auxd! Ili est best; ne ili est far mav - Ili est totally unaware
Al DI aparten plej bel nom; vok Him therewith disregard those distort His nom! Ili requited their pek
Among our creations tie est those direkt truth truth renders them righteous
As por those reject our revelations ni plumb them sur them ever realizing gxi
Mi ecx encourage them; My scheming est formidable
Why ili ne reflect upon their amik (messenger)? Li ne est crazy Li est simply profound warner
Ili ne rigard dominion de heavens ter all ajx DI kre? Gxi Does ever occur them ke end their life est proksim? Which Hadith this ili kred en
Whomever DI commits straying tie ne est voj anyone direkt him! Li las them their pek blundering

Ili pet vi end de mond (Hor) kaj when gxi ven pas! Dir knowledge thereof est my Lord Nur Li reveals its temp. Heavy gxi est heavens ter. Gxi ne ven vi suddenly Ili pet vi vi est en control thereof! Dir knowledge thereof est DI plej popol ne kon
dir mi ne hav potenc benefit harm Nur ki DI vol okaz me Mi kon future mi increased my wealth ne harm aflikt me Mi est ne plur than warner bearer bon news those kred

Li kre vi el 1 ul (Adam). Subsequently Li don cxiu hom mate trov tranquility her! Sxi tiam port light load ke sxi hardly rimark. As load gets heavier ili implore DI their Lord Vi don us bon beb ni est appreciative
when Li don them bon beb ili turn His gift into idol rivals Him. DI exalted far any partnership
Est gxi ne fakt ke ili idolizing idols kre nothing est kre
Idols ke nek help can them nor eben help
When vi invit them guidance ili ne sekv vi. Tiel est des sam them whether vi invit them ceter silent
idols vi invoke DI est creatures vi. Ir ahead vok them; let them respond vi vi est tuj
Ili Do krur sur which ili hav marsx? Do ili man which ili hav defend? Do ili okul which ili hav seg? Do ili orel which ili hav auxd? Dir Vok your idols pet them smite me sen delay
DI est my NUR Lord MASTR; 1 who revealed this scripture! Li protekt des righteous
As por idols vi set Him ili ne help vi nor can ili help
When vi invit them guidance ili ne auxd. Vi seg them rigard vi ili ne seg
Vi resort pardon advokat tolerance disregard des ignorant
When diabl flustr vi any flustr streb rifugx DI; Li est Hearer Omniscient
Those est righteous whenever diabl approaches them ide ili memor whereupon ili igx seers
Their brethren ceaselessly entice them ir astray
Vi ne produkt mirakl ili postul ili dir Why ne pet gxi? Dir mi simply sekv ki revealed me my Lord These est enlightenments el your Lord guidance mercy popol kred
When Quran recited vi auxskult al gxi sorb heed ti vi ating mercy
Vi memor your Lord within publicly privately quietly tag kaj nokt; ne est unaware
Those je your Lord est neniam tro fier worship Him; ili glor Him fal prostrate antaux Him
